channel.title: HTTP :: CIS 527 Textbook
channel.description: YouTube Video Resources Slides Hypertext Transfer Protocol (HTTP) on Wikipedia Video Transcript Next, letâ€™s review a couple of application layer protocols. One of the most common of those is the Hypertext Transfer Protocol, or HTTP. HTTP was developed by Tim Berners-Lee while he worked at CERN in the late 1980s as part of his project to build the World Wide Web. HTTP itself is an application-layer protocol that is built on top of the TCP transport-layer protocol.
